mil7.4.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘vayussa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.4:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena vimuttivarakusumapupphitarammanavanantare ramitabbam.
mil7.4.4:1.4: Idam, maharaja, vayussa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.4:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, vayu dharaniruhapadapagane mathayati;
mil7.4.4:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena vanantaragatena sankhare vicinantena kilesa mathayitabba.
mil7.4.4:2.3: Idam, maharaja, vayussa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.4:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, vayu akase carati;
mil7.4.4:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena lokuttaradhammesu manasam sancarayitabbam.
mil7.4.4:3.3: Idam, maharaja, vayussa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.4:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, vayu gandham anubhavati;
mil7.4.4:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena attano silavarasurabhigandho anubhavitabbo.
mil7.4.4:4.3: Idam, maharaja, vayussa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.4:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, vayu niralayo aniketavasi;
mil7.4.4:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena niralayamaniketamasanthavena sabbattha vimuttena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.4:5.3: Idam, maharaja, vayussa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
